data.title: The Antz
data.text:
> As I said you seem to be the forgotten man of the Antz.

The Nashville photo was from a review by Jane Suck in Sounds. Our first.

How did you come to join the Antz ?

I put an ad in Melody Maker for a drummer and a bassist. Adam (Stuart ashe was then) guessed from this that I must be a guitarist and rang me. We

he got any hits.

Jordan got involved quite early on ?? What did she bring to the band and what did you make of her ?? Was a lot of the image thing and lyrics contrived to be punkier ??

Adam wooed Jordan because she was at the centre of things in 1977. The

helped us get the Jubilee job.

Punkier? Punk was a Sun word. We weren't punks. What's a punk? Punk?

The band straight away attracted negative press reaction. Why do you think this was ???

We didn't get press negative or positive, full stop. We were invisible.

How was the band viewed by other punk bands ??? I mean you got on well
